reviews.review:
Game is fun with friends, but it can be a frustrating experience, if you take it even semi-seriously. 

Solo games where four people connect can have someone leave instantly, and the leaver faces no penalties aside from losing meaningless rank points. Other times, the game can feel like a contest to see who can be the most toxic to the other. Finally, the Killer can just disconnect at slightest hint of a loss ending the game entirely, which can result in the loss of rank for survivors even if they were doing well.

Then, there are the connection issues where game's are laggy on P2P connections, so hit boxes do not match up correctly between survivor and killer. This can lead to either side missing when it seems like the hit boxes connected on their screen or being hit when the killer's weapon is no where near their body.

This game is really good, the graphics to game play to controls are well executed as you play with 3 other players or by yourself as killer you find there's great diversity with each character having their own special ability's , graphics are quite nice most of the time it is quite dark and gloomy as should be for a horror game runs pretty well on my pc didnt have any issues 10/10

As of today (2/11/2020) the developers brought a new feature that gives penalty to the players who leave an ongoing match to queue for another game. As if unbalanced players/nature of the game itself weren't enough to bare now you are forced to stay in an undesired game. To this day, I still disconnect and play other games, wait for penalty timer to cooldown and come back to carry on playing.

This is not the solution and how developers should address the game, because the game nowhere near being perfect but penalties are being enforced. The game needs better fixing.

Consistenly inconsistent experience match after match, many bugs and desync. Oh boy, isn't latency the biggest issue of this game. You play as a survivor, you get hit across the map even though the killer was nowhere near you.

Apart from these things stated above, the game can be quite entertaining and rewarding from time to time. You will have higher chances of succeeding with friends than with solo queue random team mates when playing as a survivor.

The developers have been announcing that they have been working on well known issues of the game and they keep pushing hotfix patches as well as new content with each update so that's a thumbs up for the developers.

I reckon this game will soon get rid of its game breaking issues for both sides and it will be even more fun to play.

Best time to grab this game would be a discount,

See you in the fog!

EDIT: Game is trash! Stupid hits are connecting on server side and being validated, this reflects negatively to the player experience! So Æ’ucking bad game! I would definitely not recommend it until the core mechanics and issues of this game is fixed! Not worth your time as of now!

Update: As of today (6/22/2021) developers have disabled the cosmetic glitch with the patch 5.0.1 which prevents players from changing set outfit parts of many characters. Instead of fixing game breaking issues, they address cosmetics which have no impact on gameplay or give any advantage at all. They have weird priorities when it comes to combatting bugs/glitches. The R.P.D map is still not playable to this day since its launch and there are newer game breaking issues alongside the latest DLC. 

It looks like my negative review is going to be around until this game dies out because people behind this game have no intention to properly treat this game at all. What a waste of potential..

2021 Review UPDATE:

This game is quickly going downhill because it offers a horrible experience in solo queue as survivor. You are still getting hit validated even though the killer's lunge wasn't even close to you on your end. A lot of busted killers out there with their add-ons and powers untouched. The developer team keeps introducing more busted killlers that shorten the chase time, the one and only fun thing to do in game. Many players including myself disconnect from an ongoing match just because there is no fun element to going down within the first 15 seconds of a match because of poor map design (dead zones) and busted killers that have the ability to quickly down you. (Trickster, Blight, Pinhead)

I'm not going to go into a lot of detail in this review, people that play both sides know the experience in first hand. The community is still full of ğš›etarded players thinking they outplayed you with busted killers/perks.

DbD has a competitor in the horizon, that being VHS. They better start worrying about the future of this game otherwise it might be inevitable of players to shift to a better, fun and rewarding game like VHS itself.

LATE 2021 REVIEW UPDATE:

The game has hit a better state than before. Although it's a matter of consistency, nobody knows how long the game is going to keep its good state. For the meantime, the game's quality of life has improved the most ever since its release.

The Skill Based Matchmaking offers a variety of results. It does please some, it displeases some. There are mix results and feedbacks from the community. At this rate, I would say it's experimental.

In the future, I hope that they fine tune the game more and keep improving it.

I can finally recommend Dead by Daylight for anyone now after many years.

MID 2022 REVIEW UPDATE:

As of today (7/19/2022) with the 6.1.0 patch, developers took away how some of us used to play. If you take away something, you have to give something back in return. This patch gives nothing but useless tweaks here and there that does nothing to core game. I'm just glad I had the time of my life when the game was fairly new and it was just getting popular. The developers don't even know how to properly do things.

Dead Hard did not need a nerf, everyone knows how to play around it. And if it were to change, it should have never applied deep wound status effect. It should have worked like Mettle of Man where it negates the killer hit and gives you speed boost without giving you deep wound status effect. Dead Hard is supposed to help me, not turn my experience into a miserable mending simulator.

Spine Chill was completely changed into a useless perk. Its purpose was to give survivor an early getaway. Now it lights up based on terror radius and if the killer has direct line of sight on you. (??? What the hell is the point of that?) On the other hand, Whispers, aka the killer version of Spine Chill remains untouched and works the same way the old Spine Chill does. See the hypocrisy there?

Iron Will, one of my all time favorite perk has been nerfed because of people insisting not to learn how to play against it but demand an easy solution.

Self-Care, a perk that was alright-ish if you were playing solo survivor is now completely useless. I don't know how many times Self-Care saved my life when I was playing solo. I pulled off so many plays taking a hit, healing myself away from killer and jumping back in action either to tank another hit for a team mate or to rush for an unhook being healthy to take a hit again for my unhooked team mate. Not to mention Self-Care countered Franklin's Demise really good because if you had a med kit you'd lose it.

These 4 perks were my unchanged perks for many years. Now BHVR wants me to play differently and I am not going to play differently. If it ain't broke, don't try to fix it. These perks were never broken and they functioned the way they did for years until recently.

I hope queue times to find a lobby as killer will take a huge impact and increase after this patch goes live. I'm expecting player count drop and interest to play survivor is going to drop over time.

After 3000+ hours since 2018, I've come to a conclusion that I am uninstalling this game because of them not nerfing but killing perks. Good luck catering to new comers BHVR. Nothing stays forever. Time for me to move on to something else.

Not recommended, here's why:

First, the community is toxic beyond anything, forget CS:GO, forget DotA2, forget LoL, those communities are pleasant compared to this one. Why you may ask? Well, because the game rewards being toxic as a survivor, if you complete the gens in 5 minutes then realize that the killer(that would be me) is a noob who doesn't know crap, you can simply just hang around for 25 more minutes fucking around with no real threat of being caught. That's even worse with swf groups who (in my experience at least) tend to even bm you with flashlight raids.

Second: The matchmaking is infuriating, after being bullied twice in a row as Wraith, i turned to the wise people on the internet and asked what i could do to still be able to enjoy this game(how silly of me right?), and 2 suggestions arose, first: play and master Nurse, 2nd dodge lobbies with people who join exactly at the same time. I practiced those 2, and 3 out of 5 matches i got matched up with people who ranked at 13 at worst and 9 at best. So with my 7 hours of experience, the game just matched me up with people who have at least thrice the experience.

If you love the thrill of not getting caught then this is your game. Its scary when the killer gets near and you have to choose either to continue what your doing or hide. I've had so many close calls in this game where i just thought how did i get away with that. You have to play this with your friends because the teamwork makes the game even better. Also playing custom games with 4 other friends is so much fun. We take turns being the killer and see who is best out of the group.
super jeu ;)

Fun game with friends but don't play killer. Its pointless the community is League of legends level toxic, going in solo as killer is both boring and a waste of your time. You'll find maybe one enjoyable game in ten if you play killer. It paints me to say because my friends and i got into the game and have as a group enjoyed it. But only when playing survivor, if you enjoyed playing Killer as I did then don't buy it, its not worth your money.

Right so update, this is being written a year or so later. AAAANd its worse. The Community is pretty much dogshit, the game can be fun but survive with friends ruins it, while yes its fun to play with mates, if you're killer and you see a lobby of 4, dodge it. Its not worth your time, its more fun to walk to a corner and watch youtube for 30 mintues than it is to play against SWF. Survivors will flame and critasize a killer for "Crutch" perks, which is pure hypocrisy when pretty much ass these asshats run Desisive Strike (which hasnt become any less toxic with the rework with survivors throwing themselves at you to proc it) etc. Playing Killer is a dull affair, any skill that comes into it is removed by certain maps. Playing on farms etc you may as well Alt-F4 and leave. 

Opinon unchanged, if you want to play killer, save your money. This game hates killer players and panders purely to a toxic community.

After having played this game for a while I find it to require to be unistalled because the gameplay got very unpleasant. The continuous crashes and loading screen locked that force you to close the app with the task manager and everything else, from decisive strike abortion, and the continuously creation of op killers which are actually become more and more hard to escape from (see the ghost), unless they just don`t know how to play.
Face camping and tunneling, which are still quite controversial things within dbd community, are however a problem and have never been addressed properly (e.g. with blood points penalties or some sort of things which force the killer to fkng move away from at least 20metres from the hook, I would honestly find something like that, could potentially avoid survivors being annoyed and left to the mercy/fair play code of the killer which basically can do whatever wants when he/she gets you on the hook for the first time).
I really enjoyed playing this game and I don`t understand why dbd team keeps working on creating more content to buy, when the gameplay is actually being ruined in the first place. Playing a killer is indeed awesome, however survivors is not it anymore, in my opinion. Contributing to my thoughts of this game as garbage to uninstall.

Hopefully you will go back to shape it as a playable product in the future.

Fuck this game. Fuck behavior... Oh, and check out VHS. It looks far more promising if you're wanting a asymmetrical horror game.

The devs are definitely working hard to improve this game. I just wish they would focus on killers a bit more, because it's impossible to beat a strong SWF team, no matter how good you are as a killer. Stop nerfing the good ones!

I bought this game 3 years ago. I DO NOT RECOMMEND, AT ALL, NOT IN A MILLION YEARS, that you spend any money for this game.
Constant bugs that aren't dealt with, combined with constant new dlcs have made me to utterly despise the developers behind this game.
Game crashes:
0 compared to a few years ago. but now the buggs and laggs in this game are just terrible
- 1 survivor that dcs after start: no penalties for the killer whatsoever, just a bonus

the devs DONT FIX BUGS because they're too busy with NEW CONTENT and constant nerfing of survivors, meanwhile the killers don't get any nerfs whatsoever. (if there are, they are so minimal, you barely notice)

don't buy this game if you're not prepared to endure laggy games and random survivor weapon hits (getting downed by a killer 5 miles away from me1 with his m1 attack)
Thank you for your time.
Oh yeah, let's look at the plus side:
reports in game dont do anything, if they do, I don't really know because there is no feedback. Game lasts about 10 to 20 mins, so it's good to pass the time if you're bored at work...
BUT THEN AGAIN, SO IS SIMS
if things change, so will my review. if not, forget about it.
UPDATE:
1 year later, game still bugged like crazy.
and yes, there have ben 10 more dcls since then.
Honestly, I don't expect much from developers that work with CIG anyways. Just a huge pile of cow dung. Smells all over.
survivors got more nerfs. But the ebony memento mori is still there. yay for the killers.
I'm just gonna play without perks. why bother anyways.
another update that is due. After the endgame collapse, the killers got it easy. with noed especially, since they can now close the hatch. No penalties whatsoever.
I'm deffinitely getting the grit of this shit product. if you have at least 1 friend in the game, then it's enjoyable. As a solo player, you'll just stick to playing the killer, because playing solo survivor, is utter shiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiat.
Also, if 1 player dsc at start of the game, well gg. still nothing done for survivors. devs are continuing to be crap. as usual.
When I get hit, by an axe, that is flying half a meter away from me, I'll just call it a day.
No rework is being done for the survivors side.
Rank update error still there. let's see how much time it will take.
Okay, so, I just stepped into a trap when I wanted to disarm it. do you devs, fucking mind explaining, why I stepped into a trap instead of disarming it? yeh...... there was a gate switch next to it so what.... means disarming trap became space or what? Just get other fucking jobs really, go clean streets, pick up trash from streets, go do car washing ,because you CAN NOT DEVELOP GAMES.
holy shitballs
updated 18.2.2020
I'm playing on a gaming laptop, 4 years old. laggs created in the game, like I'm playing on a 386. no optimisation. no sense of playing anymore.
also 32gigs of space? are you fucking kidding me? what a joke.
still the same piece of dung, just as the day I bought it.
